verbose_text: To explore the possibility that treatment with panobinostat results in reduced association of the activating E2F family members, E2Fs 1, 2 and 3, with the PLK1 and Cyclin B1 promoters and therefore loss of G 2 -specific activation of PLK1 and Cyclin B1 expression, we measured association of these proteins with the endogenous PLK1 and Cyclin B1 promoters by ChIP assay.
